resources.string: During the game you need to click on the soccer ball in a certain time.
Each time a random number will appear on top of the ball. That\'s the number of times you need to click on the ball.
There are three levels in the game, they differ in time and the number of clicks you need to make in the available time.
More difficult levels are unlocked after passing the previous one. You can also check this information in the achievements section.
